email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Reset your Google 2FA now!

Dear Google User,

We have detected some unusual activity on your Google account that appears to be a security risk. In order to ensure the safety of your account and personal information, we are asking all users to reset their Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) settings immediately.

Please click on the link below to begin the reset process:
[Malicious link inserted here]

Failure to reset your 2FA settings may result in a temporary suspension of your account. We take the security of our users very seriously and want to ensure that your information is protected at all times.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
The Google Security Team
